sense.name: commit again
sense.examples: I want us to recommit. But we don't know if a criminal will recommit until they do it. I am ready to recommit myself. Or maybe you want to recommit your life to Jesus. I made the decision to love him and to recommit to our marriage. Will the country recommit itself to the task with the idealism of 1973?

sense.name: send back to a committee
sense.examples: The bill was recommitted three times in the house. There was a motion to recommit the bill. Mr. Jordan moves to recommit the bill to the Committee on Transportation. Mr. Obey moves to recommit the bill, H.R. 3010 to the Appropriations Committee.
